::Feline::

She watched him hold the cup out for her.  She smiled and took the 
cup. "Thank you."  She sipped from the cup and looked around.  She 
let go of Chordate's arm and walked over to a chair.  Her hips swayed 
and her tail moved in a flowing motion as she walked to the chair.  
She sat down and crossed her legs. Her tail draping over her lap.  
She set the cup on the table and looked at Chordate, smiling warmli 
at him. "Would you care to join me?" she said in a soft, sensual 
voice. She patted a chair next to her and motioned with her tail for 
him to come over.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate: 
> 
> Chordate sighed in a dreamy tone, Feline now moving her lovely tail 
over 
> parts of his head.  It felt wonderful!  
> "Oh...a-a drink.  Yeah.  Water?  Ok." he said, pressing a few 
buttons at a 
> dispencer with his free arm, two cups appearing.
> 
> One of the cups had cold water in it, the other had a pink liquid, 
liquid 
> energon.  Since the attack in space, and then the crash, Chordate 
hadn't had 
> much time to sit around and do nothing.  But with the kitty holding 
onto him 
> so lovingly, now was a good time for him!
> 
> Grabbing the cup of water, he held it in front of Feline, a shiver 
running 
> through him as he began to feel the vibrations of her lovely purr, 
her head 
> rubbing against his shoulder.
